title: What is the role of education in nation-building? - Quora

response.answer_text: Education plays a very important role in nation building. Because education transform the human being into an intelligent honest citizen towards its country . A proper or right education can make a independent citizen who leads to a developed country ( economic growth in for of increasing per capita income or GDP growth rate, political sensibility , enactment of his/her social responsibility towards society as well as nation). Country citizens , it's hospitality , culture ,ethical values which there people's have, manpower (youthpower) , technological growth mainly in broaden term “social control” is becomes it's identity in the world. Education teachs us behaviour , to develop sence of judgement what is right or wrong ? ,What is positive or nagetive ? ,What is beneficial for country or not ? Almost every citizen of country is representing our nation's identity in their respective sector ……. Education teach's the way of learning and it should be learning of behaviour, knowledge , science, trade, ethics , values……………………in each and every sector which we require to develop for betterment of ourself as well as country and respective world. It's my question why education is not important ? Thanks for reading …….. Giving me an opportunity to express my views on this topic.

Education is a vital component for a nation. the education level of a country decides weather a country is developed or not because only the educated population can lead to better capital formation. Education is the pathway to any nation-building enterprise. Education gives people the skills they need to help themselves out of poverty or, in other words, into prosperity. As we know that the agriculture plays a very important role in the development of a country. The education plays a great role in the field of agriculture. If we gives the education of agriculture to the students then they can perform better in the agriculture field, they can invent the new ideas which improve the rate of agriculture and their quality. so, there is a need to understand that an educated population will lead to overall growth of any nation. Thus, there is a need to spread awareness so that every individual understands the importance of education, Prayaas Corps (NGO) plays a significant role in making people understand the need of education. Also it organised the shiksha mission to provide education to the poor and disabled children.
